entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Chapleau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:26 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -32.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chapleau Airport 04:00 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
Temperature: -32.0°C
Pressure: 102.5 kPa
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -36
Dewpoint: -35.2°C
Wind: S 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:23 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries. High minus 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. A few flurries beginning in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h early in the afternoon then light late in the afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:23 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 6:23 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10. Forecast issued 6:23 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023
